nodes.text: The Revos-Scohar railway was a repulsorlift rail passage from Revos to the capital city of Scohar on the planet Storinal.

It was considered to be an engineering and public relations marvel. It was made up of a series of repulsorlift cars attached together that traveled along a featureless tunnel. It would periodically rise into open air, allowing the passengers to view the planet's snowcapped mountain peaks.
